mainbox.title: Hi ðŸ‘‹, I'm Face Recognition
mainbox.description: The facial recognition system is a computer application that automatically identifies or identifies someone from a digital photo or a video frame from a video source. One of the ways to do this is to compare pre-selected face features from the image and a face database.

powered.title: INFORMATION ABOUT FACE RECOGNITION
powered.description: You just need to select on scan it will help you scan your face

features_left.title: 3-dimensional identification
features_left.description: A new emerging trend, claimed to improve accuracy, is three-dimensional face recognition. This technique uses 3D sensors to capture information about the shape of a face. This information is then used to identify special features on the surface of a face, such as the contours of the eye sockets, nose and chin.

features_right.title: Skin texture analysis
features_right.description: An emerging trend of using image details of the skin, captured in standard digital images or scanners. This technique is called skin texture analysis, bringing characteristic lines, shapes, and nodules on a person's skin into a mathematical space.

indispensable.title: Uses of Face Recognition
indispensable.label_trailing: Support many different types of cameras
indispensable.label_description_auto_buy: Immediately after trial use, the application will automatically ask and ask you to buy to continue using. If you agree, you will be asked to enter your bank card number for payment
indispensable.label_description_auto_sell: Set your target profit and relax. Anny will monitor the price and take profit with a limit or market sell order when your target profit is reached.
indispensable.label_description_auto_stop_loss: Secure transactions at the request of customers, when the transaction is completed, there will be an invoice on the message on your device
indispensable.label_description_trailing: The software can be used for many different types of cameras, easy to use for users, and can identify many people at the same time.
indispensable.label_description_manage: Images are encrypted and saved. It will be automatically deleted after a certain period of time. Only specific users with authorization can view the face image.
indispensable.label_description_profitability: Operate with small configuration with multiple cameras. Easily expand the number of cameras after commissioning.

not_conviced.title: Reliable and Trustworthy
not_conviced.label_description_secure: We encrypt your data using an asymmetric key algorithm, the same security principle of the Blockchain technology. We transfer data using secure SSL/TLS encryption.
not_conviced.label_description_cloud: Scanner lives on high performant and secure Amazon AWS servers in Germany and operates 24/7 at lighting speed.
not_conviced.label_description_community: Need help? Our support team is ready to intake your doubts and issues. Join our community, receive news, tips and support.

team.title: Meet the humans
team.description: You know what they say, behind every AI there's a great team of creative humans.
team.sub_finance: Co-founder & Head of Finance and Legal
